title: Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 759 of 2020), hereby make the
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Fishing Vessel (Radio
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Fishing Vessel (Radio 

Installations Survey) (Revocation) Regulations 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited fishing vessel (radio installation survey) (revocation) regulation 2022

title: Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 759 of 2020), hereby make the
heading: 2. The Fishing Vessel (Radio Installations Survey) Regulations 1999 (S.I.
text_raw:
2. The Fishing Vessel (Radio Installations Survey) Regulations 1999 (S.I. 

No. 40 of 1999) are revoked. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 1 March 2022 

HILDEGARDE NAUGHTON, 
 Minister for State at the Department of Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th March, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [91] 3
text_norm: 2 fishing vessel (radio installation survey) regulation 1999 (s.i no 40 1999) revoked given hand 1 march 2022 hildegarde naughton minister state department transport notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 4th march 2022 91 3

title: Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 759 of 2020), hereby make the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations revoke the Fishing Vessel (Radio Installations Survey) 
Regulations 1999 (S.I. No. 40/1999) as survey requirements for fishing vessels 
of 15m and over are dealt with elsewhere on the Statute Book and survey 
requirements for fishing vessels of less than 15m are dealt with in the Code of 
Practice for the Design, Construction, Equipment and Operation of Small 
Fishing Vessels of less than 15 metres in length overall. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [91]
